title: Monaco part ways with head coach Kovac | Reuters
snippet: AS Monaco have decided to part ways with head coach Niko Kovac, the French club announced on Saturday, with the principality side sixth in the Ligue 1 table.

title: Monaco appoint former Brugge manager Clement as head coach | Reuters
snippet: (Reuters) - AS Monaco have appointed Philippe Clement as their new coach until June 2024 after parting ways with Niko Kovac last week, the Ligue 1 club said.

title: AS Monaco Appoint Philippe Clement As New Head Coach Until June ...
snippet: AS Monaco have appointed coach Philippe Clement on a two and half-year deal after firing Niko Kovac during the mid-season break. The 2017 Ligue 1 champion said on its website that the 47-year-old Clement signed on until June 2024 from Belgian ...

title: Monaco hire Club Brugge coach Philippe Clement to replace Niko Kovac - ESPN
snippet: AS Monaco appointed coach Philippe Clement on a two-and-a-half year deal on Monday after firing Niko Kovac during the midseason break.
